InstructionData.Title: Printer Ingot Threshold DB
InstructionData.Author: MrDrummer25
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Material DB Chip # Stores prefab hashes for all materials (metals) in the stack. # Persistent, no updating logic needed.
main: # Reset SP move sp 0
# --- Base Metals --- push HASH("Copper") push 200
push HASH("Gold") push 200
push HASH("Iron") push 200
push HASH("Lead") push 200
push HASH("Nickel") push 200
push HASH("Silicon") push 200
push HASH("Silver") push 200
# --- Alloys --- push HASH("Constantan") push 100
push HASH("Electrum") push 100
push HASH("Invar") push 100
push HASH("Solder") push 100
push HASH("Steel") push 100
# --- Superalloys --- push HASH("Astroloy") push 50
push HASH("Hastelloy") push 50
push HASH("Inconel") push 50
push HASH("Stellite") push 50
push HASH("Waspaloy") push 50
# Idle forever loop: yield j loop
